title: The Senator's Secret
description: My carefully crafted life is being threatened. Someone wants to tarnish my squeaky clean image. I make my living cleaning up the messes left behind by New York’s elite. But what happens when my life becomes the mess that I avoid so carefully?Can I trust the one man I swore to hate forever, the sexy U.S. Senator—whose name is on everyone’s lips and his body that’s rumored to be in every woman’s bed—to help me?I guess a little blackmail never looked so sexy…
author: Jennifer Rebecca
